subject: Baseball
United States Defense and Military Forces
Veterans
lead_paragraph: In a tasteful gesture to American troops in the wake of the mission against Osama bin Laden on Sunday night, the Mets’ invited military personnel to see Tuesday’s game against the Giants.
snippet: In a tasteful gesture to American troops in the wake of the mission against Osama bin Laden on Sunday night, the Mets’ invited military personnel to see Tuesday’s game against the Giants.
